text: Ani imana rakhanaryanni sarvacya sarva miluna nighu naye. Tevha ase ka na kele jave ki tyancya pratyeka mothya gatamadhu lahana gata nighava yasathi ki tyanni dina (dharma) ci samaja prapta karuna ghyavi ani yasathi ki tyanni apalya janasamuhacya lokanna, jevha te yancyajavala yetila (allahace) bhaya dakhavave, yasathi ki tyanni bhyave
